scripts.setup:local: mkdir -p .dbdata && npm run ddb:start && npm run ddb:wait && npm run ddb:init
scripts.ddb:wait: until nc -z localhost 8103; do sleep 1; done && echo "DynamoDB started" && sleep 2
scripts.ddb:init: aws dynamodb create-table --cli-input-json file://schema.json --endpoint-url http://localhost:8103 --output text --query 'Table.TableName'
